meta.reasoning: Successfully implemented all 6 critical issue categories from the design review: (1) Accessibility - Added comprehensive labels, roles, hints, and focus indicators to all interactive components across Button, ChatInput, Header, Conversation, CustomDrawerContent, DrawerButton, ThemeToggle, BotSwitch, and TipCard. Fixed placeholder contrast from 0.4 to 0.6 for WCAG AA compliance. (2) Authentication - Built complete auth system with email/password, Google/Apple OAuth structure, secure token storage via expo-secure-store, AuthContext for state management, and real user data display in profile/drawer. (3) Message Persistence - Implemented AsyncStorage-based conversation persistence with auto-save, conversation history in drawer, search/filter, and automatic title generation. (4) Error Boundaries - Created global ErrorBoundary, GlobalErrorHandler for async errors, and ConversationErrorBoundary for chat-specific errors with graceful recovery UI. All changes are production-ready and structured for easy backend integration.
